verses.name: John 10:28
verses.text: And I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand.

verses.name: John 10:29
verses.text: My Father, which gave them me, is greater than all; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father’s hand.

verses.name: John 10:30
verses.text: I and my Father are one.

verses.name: John 10:31
verses.text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him.

verses.name: John 10:32
verses.text: Jesus answered them, Many good works have I shewed you from my Father; for which of those works do ye stone me?
